title: Premium shall be applicable for BUA in lieu of additional FSI at the rate of 50% of ASR of developed
clause_text: Premium shall be applicable for BUA in lieu of additional FSI at the rate of 50% of ASR of developed land (for FSI 1) or as decided by the Government from time to time, except for the development by State Government & MCGM .
section: 33(3) Buildings of Government/MCGM/Statutory Bodies, Semi- Government and PSU Offices:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Premium shall be applicable for BUA in lieu of additional FSI at the rate of 50% of ASR of developed land (for FSI 1) or as decided
